Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE BATESVILLE BOULEVARD, BATESVILLE, Indiana, 47006, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hillenbrand Inc is a U.S.-based company that operates through three segments. The Advanced Process Solutions segment designs, develops, manufactures, and services engineered industrial equipment. The Molding Technology Solutions segment offers engineered and customized systems in plastic technology and processing. Hillenbrand's other major segment Batesville designs, provides, and markets funeral services and solutions.

value.name: Bhavik N. Soni
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
